title: Resize Image with Aspect Ratio
description: Resize an image while maintaining aspect ratio and quality
prompt: Resize my image {image_path} to be {width}x{height} pixels. Maintain the aspect ratio and image quality
example:
This will:
- Process the image file
- Resize to specified dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio
- Preserve image quality
- Save the processed image
author: GooseAI Team

image_path.description: Path to the image file to be resized
